answer:
QUESTION
Assalamalikum imam sahab iam 23 years old. i want to ask u is it allow in islam for males to cut their eyeborws because i have white hairs on my eyebrowse.
ANSWER


Share:

Assalamu Alaikum Warahmatullah

 

Brother/Sister in Islam

It is not permissible to trim your eyebrows. It is possible for you to obtain medical treatment for the white strands on your eyebrows.

 

And Allah Knows Best

 

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
